alert.note: Alert for Cascade; Chouteau; Fergus; Judith Basin; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 12:33PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Meagher, Judith Basin, western Fergus, south central Chouteau and southeastern Cascade Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles south of Belt to 11 miles northeast of White Sulphur Springs. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Geraldine, Geyser, Neihart, Raynesford, Windham, Monarch, Sluice Boxes State Park, Ackley Lake State Park, Sapphire Village, Utica, Checkerboard and Benchland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
